CHAT.comment: YELLOW TRANSPORTATION, INC., Petitioner v. MICHIGAN, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES A. ROTHFELD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF AUSTIN C. SCHLICK ON BEHALF OF UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS L. CASEY ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES A. ROTHFELD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:02 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
